text: I like how this game makes references to the classic series (you can even use E-Tanks and W-Tanks!), and its story takes place after the Zero series (and for that matter, X series). I'm still waiting for a third game, especially after reading about the extra ending scene in Advent.

author: speyeker

text: Green Gradation, Cinq Ville, Area O, and Last Area are definitely the best themes of this great and highly underrated game. If the point of games is to be fun, then this game certainly succeeds. Most said this game was bad because of its story but let me ask you this, since when did we play platformers FOR the story? I thought that was the RPG genre and for platformers if we got a good story, that'd be a bonus treat, not the necessary focus. It's like asking Mario to be deep...pff BWAHAHAHAHA!

author: Redmage1000

text:
I always wondered what they were saying in this song until I saw the title. I can definitely hear the "Cinq Ville", but after that I'm not sure about the "c'est notre espoir" part, I always hear "can't go disco" in the end which makes no sense! :P It's french for "Five city, this is our hope". It's hard to hear, especially if the video isn't at least 720p.

Fun game, I should try ZX Advent someday.
author: SupraDarky
